title: OS X 10.4 Sudden aappearence of handwritten font in webbrowser, email and online
content: Answered some email for a request for typeid on Lettpress list, they send me a direct email. Suddenly, in my email, web browser, etc, the default screen font is a what I think Wiescher font called designer. How can I shake it, I run searches and it's not visible installed on my system?
author: Ludwig Mohr

comments.content:
Have you run any special utilities such as Tinker Tool on your system that are capable of changing the system font?

Could you post a screen shot that shows exactly what is happening?
When this kind of stuff happens to me I run [Applejack](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414060114/http:/applejack.sourceforge.net/) and blast every single cache on my system clean.
